    • calculateMode

      public int calculateMode​(int startValue) throws OperationFailedException
      Calculates the mode of the histogram values i.e. the most frequently occurring item

      Should only be called on a histogram with at least one item

      Throws:
      OperationFailedException

    • calculateMaximum

      public int calculateMaximum() throws OperationFailedException
      Calculates the maximum of the histogram values i.e. the highest bin with a non-zero count

      Should only be called on a histogram with at least one item

      Throws:
      OperationFailedException

    • calculateMinimum

      public int calculateMinimum() throws OperationFailedException
      Calculates the minimum of the histogram values i.e. the lowest bin with a non-zero count

      Should only be called on a histogram with at least one item

      Throws:
      OperationFailedException

      OperationFailedException

    • iterateBins

      public void iterateBins​(Histogram.BinConsumer consumer)
      Calls consumer for every bin-value, increasing from min to max.
      Parameters:
      consumer - called for every bin

    • iterateBinsUntil

      public void iterateBinsUntil​(int limit, Histogram.BinConsumer consumer)
      Calls consumer for every bin-value until a limit, increasing from min to limit (inclusive).
      Parameters:
      limit - the maximum-bin to consume
      consumer - called for every bin

      public int getMaxBin()
      Maximum bin-value inclusive
